beer.beer_description: Mind Circus IPA has a mild bitterness and a thick, luscious mouthfeel. This style of IPA is what is being called in the beer world a “Hazy IPA” Dominantly herbaceous and grassy, with moderate tropical notes as well as some bright citrus. This unique hazy IPA gains its flavor of grapes and grass from the Nelson hops, and its tropical notes of pineapple and mango from the Strata hops. It is unfiltered leaving a “haze” and some yeast for more texture. Oats were also used to add to the softer mouthfeel and hazy appearance.

It is unfiltered leaving a “haze” and some yeast for more texture. Oats were also used to add to the softer mouthfeel and hazy appearance.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 11)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 12!

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 95 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 20!

Start the season off right with your friends from Punch Cigars! Get to know the Official Cigar of Beer Lovers a little better here: www.punchcigars.com.
For sale in the U.S. only.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 260 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 53!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 220 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 45!

items.comment: Well that's beer 24 since you started vacation. Aren't you full yet.

items.badge_description: Fresh air and great beer — a perfect combo. Celebrate your adventure with the exclusive Love Hiking badge, brought to you by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Both proud B Corps, these brands are committed to protecting the outdoors and inspiring every step of your journey. Earning this badge also qualifies you for one (1) entry in the Beer Gear: Love Hiking Giveaway sponsored by Athletic Brewing Co. and Oboz Footwear. Terms and conditions apply, click here for more details.

items.badge_description: Does the word picking favorites mean anything to you? Obviously not. That's 10 different beers in a row.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 10 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 3!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 10 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 3! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 10 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 3.
